Plot: A probing investigation into the lies, greed and corruption surrounding D.C. super-lobbyist Jack Abramoff and his cronies.
Title: Casino Jack and the United States of Money
Actors: Jack Abramoff, Melanie Sloan, Nina Easton, Dana Rohrabacher
tomatoConsensus: Casino Jack's subject matter is enraging, but in the hands pf director Alex Gibney, it's also well-presented and briskly entertaining.
